comment.author: 54904823@N00
comment._content: Surrogate George M.S. Schulz of the Bronx, formerly a city magistrate and member of both houses of the State Legislature, died shortly after noon yesterday at his home, 2,208 Loring Place, the Bronx. I started a biography at Wikipedia: en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_M.S._Schulz [http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5084037636/in/photostream/]
